personal.name: Said Mustafa Said
personal.title: AI/ML Engineer | LLMs & MLOps Specialist
personal.bio: AI/ML Engineer specializing in LLMs, MLOps, and large-scale AI infrastructure. Over 3 years of experience architecting end-to-end ML pipelines, fine-tuning LLMs, and building multi-agent RAG systems deployed on enterprise cloud platforms. Proven track record of driving 90% workflow automation, 70% deployment acceleration, and up to 60% cost savings through AI-driven solutions and scalable infrastructure. Skilled at bridging technical depth with executive-level communication.

categories.AI/ML: LLM Fine-Tuning, Multi-Agent RAG, LangChain, LangGraph, Hugging Face, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Bedrock, MLflow, Weights & Biases, Vector Databases, Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Process Automation
categories.Cloud & DevOps: AWS (SageMaker, Lambda, EKS, Step Functions, EC2, S3), GCP, Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, CI/CD, CloudFormation, Monitoring (CloudWatch, Grafana, Prometheus)
categories.Data & Systems: Vector Databases (FAISS, Pinecone, LanceDB), RDS, DynamoDB, SQL, Cassandra, Redis, ETL pipelines, Data Modeling, Data Transformation
categories.Python & Backend: Python, pandas, SQLAlchemy, FastAPI, TypeScript, Java, Bash

experience.title: Cloud Machine Learning Specialist
description: Delivered 30+ AI/ML and cloud projects covering ML infrastructure, big data ETL, and intelligent automation, leveraging AWS, Terraform, EKS, and SageMaker.
Architected and deployed 25+ AI/ML models (LLMs, RAG, OCR, custom NLP) with advanced MLOps pipelines, achieving up to 90% automation and 70% faster deployment.

Built multi-agent RAG platforms (customer support, query generation, document automation) using vector databases (FAISS, Pinecone) and LangChain for retrieval-augmented workflows, implementing automated orchestration pipelines for enterprise processes.
Partnered with executives (CTOs, boards) to design AI strategies, including Amazon Q Pro rollout for 40+ developers, boosting coding productivity by 60%.
Led cloud migrations and optimizations (Cassandra → RDS, SQL Server → MySQL, WordPress CDN redesign), delivering zero downtime and 40–60% cost savings.

experience.title: Intern Penetration Tester
description: Performed penetration testing & audits using Burp Suite & Metasploit; identified and remediated critical vulnerabilities.
Automated recurring security checks with Python & Bash, increasing compliance efficiency.
Communicated security findings to non-technical stakeholders, ensuring adoption of best practices.

blogPosts.title: Understanding LLMs
